trans-unit.source: Represents a control that displays a menu of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> objects and <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个控件，该控件显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 对象和 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton" /> 控件的菜单。

trans-unit.source: Like the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown> interface, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> displays a menu of <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> objects and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown>接口，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>显示的菜单<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>对象和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>控件。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown> Interface, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> interface raises <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Click> events, rather than <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown.SelectionChanged> events, when a user clicks a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown>接口，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>接口引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Click>事件，而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown.SelectionChanged>事件，当用户单击<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>。

trans-unit.source: This means, for example, that the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Click> event is raised twice when a user clicks the same <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> twice.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，例如，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Click>两次用户单击相同时引发事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>两次。

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown.SelectionChanged> event would be raised at most once when the initial selection was made for the same scenario on a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown>, depending on what the selection was before the first click.)
trans-unit.target: (<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown.SelectionChanged>时为同一方案上进行初始选择已将最多一次引发事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDown>，取决于在第一次单击之前已的所选内容。)

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A> property controls whether the currently selected <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> is visually differentiated from the unselected items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A>属性控制是否当前所选<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>以可视方式的区别在于未选定的项。

trans-unit.source: Only one item at a time can be selected in a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>.
trans-unit.target: 可以在中选择一次只有一项<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ItemImageSize%2A> property can be used to specify image sizes other than 16x16 and 32x32.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ItemImageSize%2A>属性可以用于指定 16 x 16 和 32 x 32 以外的图像大小。

trans-unit.source: To add RibbonDropDownItem objects at design time
trans-unit.target: 若要在设计时添加 RibbonDropDownItem 对象

trans-unit.source: Click the **Items** property in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 单击**项**中的属性**属性**窗口。

trans-unit.source: Click the ellipsis (**...**).
In the **DropDown Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new items.
trans-unit.target: 在**下拉列表中集合编辑器**、 添加、 排序和编辑新项。

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton> controls to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> at design time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonButton>控件添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>在设计时。

trans-unit.source: To add RibbonButton controls at design time
trans-unit.target: 在设计时添加 RibbonButton 控件

trans-unit.source: Click the **Buttons** property in the **Properties** window.
trans-unit.target: 单击**按钮**中的属性**属性**窗口。

trans-unit.source: Click the ellipsis (**...**).
In the **Button Collection Editor**, add, order, and edit new button controls.
trans-unit.target: 在**按钮集合编辑器**、 添加、 排序和编辑新按钮控件。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonGallery%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>通过使用在运行时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonGallery%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object:
trans-unit.target: 可通过两种方法来访问 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> 对象：

trans-unit.source: By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前，可以设置此控件的某些属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关设置这些属性的信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user clicks a button on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上的按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if any button is clicked on the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何按钮时，将引发此事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>。

trans-unit.source: You can determine which button was clicked by examining the `sender` parameter of the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定哪个按钮被单击通过检查`sender`的事件处理程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of buttons on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上的按钮的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of buttons on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上的按钮集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add buttons to this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> at run time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将按钮添加到此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>在运行时。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user clicks an item on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上的项时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised every time a user clicks a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> on this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>.
trans-unit.target: 每次用户单击时，将引发此事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>上<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A> property is set to `true`, this event is raised only when a user clicks an item that is not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A>属性设置为`true`，仅当用户单击当前未选择的项时，将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of <c>Item</c> columns in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 中的“项”列的数量<c></c>。

trans-unit.source: The number of <c>Item</c> columns in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 数<c>项</c>中此列<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c> that represents the size of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c>表示大小的<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />控件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> is part of a menu.
trans-unit.target: 此属性如果不起作用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>是菜单的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ControlSize%2A> of a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> that appears on a menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular` unless the parent control's `ItemSize` is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ControlSize%2A>的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>上显示一个菜单始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`除非父控件的`ItemSize`设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: To make <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> drop-down menu controls appear larger, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton> to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>下拉列表菜单控件出现更大，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>到`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> control on a menu or split button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置菜单或拆分按钮中此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 控件上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the text on a menu or split button.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示菜单或拆分按钮上的文本。

trans-unit.source: The description appears when this control is nested in another menu or split button, and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the menu, or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the split button, is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 在此控件嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，描述将显示与<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性菜单上，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton.ItemSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的拆分按钮的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: This property can be changed at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the button.
trans-unit.target: 一个在按钮上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A>属性会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that you can use to identify the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> in the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> 事件处理程序中标识 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that you can use in the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> event handler to identify the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，可用于在 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> 事件处理程序中标识 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。

trans-unit.source: After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property.
trans-unit.target: 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。

trans-unit.source: To load the image, add code to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> and set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> object to the image that you want to load.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>并设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>到想要加载的映像的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if either the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ImageName%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that gives the dimensions of the images that are displayed by the items in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，用于提供此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 中的项所显示的图像的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that gives the dimensions of the images that are displayed by the items in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，可提供此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 中的项所显示的图像尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> interface gives more control over the image size than either <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>接口提供更好地控制图像大小以外<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonSplitButton>。

trans-unit.source: It is the only one of the three interfaces that enables you to specify an image width and height in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 它是唯一的三个接口，可用于以像素为单位指定图像宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: This property does not affect the size of images displayed on buttons in this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不会影响在此按钮上显示的图像的大小<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> components in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 中 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 组件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> components in this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 组件集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> objects to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>对象添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>在设计时或在运行时。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> is opened.
trans-unit.target: 打开 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs every time the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> is opened, even when there are no items or buttons in it.
trans-unit.target: 发生此事件的每次<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>打开时，即使没有任何项或在其中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 的键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: The current keyboard shortcut for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 的当前键盘快捷键。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。

trans-unit.source: If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image to display on the control, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在控件上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.
trans-unit.target: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A> property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A>属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。

trans-unit.source: The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon.
trans-unit.target: 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760).
trans-unit.target: 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A> property, because the images are cached in the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Image%2A>属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns Microsoft Office icons to two items in a gallery control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配给库控件中的两个项。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office project templates in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**到通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 项目模板创建的项目的项。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a gallery to the group.
trans-unit.target: 将库添加到组。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the gallery, if the gallery is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置库的位置（如果库在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> that represents the position of the gallery, if the gallery is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" />，表示库的位置（如果库在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Position%2A> property has no effect when the gallery is placed in a group on the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Position%2A>属性时库放置在功能区上的组没有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> components that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> displays.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 显示的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 组件的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> components that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> displays.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 显示的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 组件的行数。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> scrolls if it has more <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> components than can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>滚动如果它包含更多<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>组件不是可以显示。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户将指针移到此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上方时显示的提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.
trans-unit.target: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A> value must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A>值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A> value appears as the title of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A>值将显示的标题为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前所选的项目。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The currently selected item is only visually distinguishable from the rest of the items if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定的项是仅以可视方式区分开来的项的其余部分如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> has at least one <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> in its <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A> collection, then <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A> is guaranteed not to be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>至少有一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>中其<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A>集合，然后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A>不保证是`null`。

trans-unit.source: By default, the first <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A> collection is selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，第一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A>选择集合。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> components that are in this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> control's <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只能设置为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>组件包含在此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>控件的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the currently selected <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前选定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the currently selected <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前选定的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItemIndex%2A> property changes the value returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItemIndex%2A>属性更改返回的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In effect, changing the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItemIndex%2A> property changes the selection.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，更改<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItemIndex%2A>属性更改选定内容。

trans-unit.source: Values assigned to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItemIndex%2A> must be from 0 (zero) through (`Items.Count` - 1).
trans-unit.target: 分配给值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItemIndex%2A>必须介于 0 （零） 通过 (`Items.Count` -1)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A> collection is empty, this property returns -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A>集合为空，则此属性返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 关联的图像是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image that is associated with the control is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果与控件关联的图像可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Image%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ImageName%2A>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.OfficeImageId%2A> property at design time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性自动设置为`true`如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Image%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ImageName%2A>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.OfficeImageId%2A>在设计时属性。

trans-unit.source: You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其设置为`false`若要使此控制选项可隐藏与关联的图像。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Image%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ImageName%2A>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.OfficeImageId%2A> property at run time does not change the value of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Image%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ImageName%2A>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在运行时不会更改的值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowImage%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不起作用的此实例按钮快速访问工具栏上显示。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, but there is no image associated with the control, a blank image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`，但没有与控件关联的图像，显示一个空白图像。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether images are displayed for the items in the gallery.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为库中的项显示图像。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the images are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示图像，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether labels are shown for items on this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 中的项显示标签。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the labels are visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the currently selected <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> is visually differentiated from the rest of the unselected items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前所选的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem" /> 在外观上是否与其余未选择的项有所区别。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if selected items are highlighted, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果所选项突出显示，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A> property to `false` does not cause the current selection to go away.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A>属性`false`不会导致当前所选内容自行消失。

trans-unit.source: The current selection is just not visually identified in the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 在用户界面中只是不直观地标识当前所选内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A> is guaranteed not to be `null` if this <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> has at least one <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> in its <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SelectedItem%2A>不保证是`null`如果此<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>至少有一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>中其<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: By default, the first <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem> in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A> collection is selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，第一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonDropDownItem>中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Items%2A>选择集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Click> event of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery> is raised only when a user clicks an item that is not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ShowItemSelection%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.Click>事件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery>仅当用户单击当前未选择的项时，才引发。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 的标签是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the label is visible, otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果标签可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> 上时显示的多行提示文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains multiline tip text.
trans-unit.target: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A> appears under <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A> text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A>下显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A>文本。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A>, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A> enables line breaks in the string.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.ScreenTip%2A>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonGallery.SuperTip%2A>字符串中的启用分行符。
